Class Court

java.lang.Object
  aLibrary.A3ButtonHandler
      Court

public class Court
extends aLibrary.A3ButtonHandler

The Court class provides:

  • a window to contain the other graphics objects

  • 3 buttons that send messages to the graphics objects

  • 2 Round Rectangles that will be manipulated by user input through the buttons

Version:
2008
Author:
CSC 142

Field Summary
private  int BOTTOM_LINE
          the bottom line y coordinate
private  Car carA
          the two car objects
private  Car carB
          the two car objects
private  aLibrary.A3ButtonWindow window
          the window that contains buttons and graphics objects
 
Constructor Summary
Court()
          Constructor for objects of class Court that must do the following things: instantiate the window instantiate two cars of different colors - only one of them should be the selected car initialize the text on the 3 buttons repaint the window
 
Method Summary
 Car getOtherCar(Car movingCar)
          gets the other Car object used for collision detection
 void leftAction()
          event handler method for the left button it must deselect the current car and select the next car
 void midAction()
          event handler method for the middle button it must advance the direction of the selected car
 void rightAction()
          event handler method for the right button it must cause the selected car to move
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Constructor Detail

Court

public Court()
Constructor for objects of class Court that must do the following things:
  • instantiate the window
  • instantiate two cars of different colors - only one of them should be the selected car
  • initialize the text on the 3 buttons
  • repaint the window

Method Detail

getOtherCar

public Car getOtherCar(Car movingCar)
gets the other Car object used for collision detection

Parameters:
movingCar - Car that wants to move
Returns:
the other Car we do not want to hit!
